scripts.audit: node ../../../common/scripts/rush-audit.js && rimraf node_modules package-lock.json && npm i --package-lock-only 2>&1 && npm audit
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc -p . && dev-tool run bundle
scripts.integration-test:browser: concurrently "npm run tests:server" "npm run test:browser-with-proxy" --kill-others --success first
scripts.integration-test:node: concurrently "npm run tests:server" "npm run test:node-with-proxy" --kill-others --success first
scripts.integration-test: npm run integration-test:node && npm run integration-test:browser
scripts.unit-test: npm run unit-test:node && npm run unit-test:browser
scripts.test:browser: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run integration-test:browser
scripts.test:node: npm run clean && npm run build:test && npm run integration-test:node
scripts.test: npm run clean && npm run build:test && npm run unit-test
